p:
At a follow-up in November 2019, CT scans showed right hilar lymph nodes that were significantly enlarged and low fever, fatigue, and poor appetite were present. Treatment with axitinib was started, achieving partial remission (PR). As of the last follow-up on 6 May 2020, the disease continues to stabilize. The timeline of the patient's disease development, treatment and outcome is shown in
Figure 3 .
